name: Ballon Shooter (MinelsGO)
description:
Ballon Shooter is a game where you have to shoot balloons before they can escape the screen.

This Game is still in development, this build is besides a few Web GL optimizations over a year old. But I want to continue working on it from now on.

Controls:

You have to click into the game, before you can control it.

W, A, S, D, Arrow Keys = Movement

Return = Shoot

P = pause

Touch Mode: Mobile Phone:

Touch mode should automatically activate on phones.

Tablets:

Wait til the game is loaded, turn the device into portrait mode and switch to full screen.

Known Bugs:
  • The sound isn't adjustable in the menu. (it is adjustable in game)
  • The close Button just freezes the game.
  • “WebGL builds are not supported on mobile devices.” is displayed while loading. I don't know why, the game is working on mobile phones as well.
  • Some Balloons have a line on the left of them.
  • The sounds are terrible.
  • The game is too easy.
  • The name has a spelling mistake. (This was my stupidity while creating the game, but I'm not going to change the name)

Let me know if you discover more.
